sentences.english: The singular points are accurately detected at the centroid of the connected component.
sentences.chinese: 采用连通区域求质心的方法精确定位奇异点。

sentences.english: Centroid jamming is an important means for naval vessels resisting anti-ship missile.
sentences.chinese: 质心干扰是水面舰艇对抗反舰导弹的一种重要手段。

sentences.english: The spectral centroid shift (SCS) of ultrasonic backscattering signals is introduced to assess cancellous bones.
sentences.chinese: 采用超声背散射信号的质心偏移量来评价松质骨。

sentences.english: If I look at the definition of the center of mass, it's the average value of x.
sentences.chinese: 由质心的定义可知，它就是x的平均值。

sentences.english: Dilution jamming is an important means for naval vessels resisting anti-ship missile.
sentences.chinese: 质心干扰是水面舰艇对抗反舰导弹的一种重要手段。

sentences.english: Calculate the new centroids of the clusters now that its data may have moved.
sentences.chinese: 计算各组的新的质心现在，它的数据可能移动。

sentences.english: Find the distance between centroids of the clusters and the data.
sentences.chinese: 找到之间的联网和数据的质心的距离。

sentences.english: Any rotating body has an angular momentum about its center of mass.
sentences.chinese: 任何旋转的物体在其质心附近都有一个角动量。

sentences.english: In particular, we have seen the notion of center of mass.
sentences.chinese: 特别地，我们学过质心的概念。

sentences.english: Yes the new centroids are found using average.
sentences.chinese: 是新的质心被发现使用的平均水平。

definition: circular orbit (in astronomy and in astronautics)
to rotate about an axis/axis of rotation (math.)
